== Planning ==

=== Meeting 1 ===	
Date		: 23rd July 2010

Time		: 2.00 p.m. – 3.00 p.m. 

Attendance	: All members

Agendas	:
 * All members gave suggestions on what kind of project our group should develop.
      * Khoo	: A musical instrument simulator
      * Wong	: A restaurant ordering system
      * Lim	: A role-playing game where players play music notes to kill monsters
      * Choo	: A hearing evaluation program that helps to determine whether a person’s hearing is defected

 * General concepts and implementations of all suggestions have been discussed.
 * Our group has decided to take up Khoo’s suggestion and we named our project Advanced Visual Instrument.
 * Khoo has been elected as the group leader through a majority voice.
 * Meetings will be conducted on 2.00pm, every Thursday.

=== Meeting 2 ===	
Date		: 29th July 2010

Time		: 2.00 p.m. – 3.00 p.m.

Attendance	: All members

Agendas	:
 * Overall concept of the project has been reviewed and discussed. The matters discussed are as followed:
    * Users - Include all age ranges, from children aged 5 years old to senior citizens.
    * GUI - User-friendly and intuitive (A sketch of the GUI (ver. 1) can be found in Documentation page.)
    * Functions - Able to produce corresponding sounds when user clicks the mouse or presses the keyboard, playback several composed music files simultaneously and record voices from microphone

 * Modules in the project has been identified according to the functions and assigned to every group member.
    * Khoo	: Instrument module
    * Wong	: Recording module
    * Lim	: Mixing module
    * Choo	: Graphical User Interface module
